document.full_text: soldiers killed the security chief of the top commander of colombia's farc guerrillas in a gain for the government in its war on a decades-old leftist insurgency, authorities said on saturday.
document.title: colombian army kills farc guerrilla security chief
lines_and_colors: soldiers killed the security chief of the top commander of colombia's farc guerrillas in a gain for the government in its war on a decades-old leftist insurgency, authorities said on saturday.
